title: Frontend Software Developer
description: Fullstack developer and analyst of information systems with 4 years of experience in the field. An expert in client side solutions and problem solving with a wide and comprehensive knowledge of web development tools, agile methodologies and programming languages.

workExperience.description: During my time in this company I had the opportunity to work on several e-learning projects, delivering beautiful, mobile-friendly and dynamic content to the final users. I learned a lot about front-end technologies, agile methodologies and the Javascript ecosystem during this period of time.
